data.name: LD_SectionPresenter
data.value: Element for displaying a mask section. Used by the XamMaskedEditor.

data.name: LD_DisplayCharacterPresenter
data.value: Element for displaying a mask display character. Used by the XamMaskedEditor.

data.name: LD_SectionsList
data.value: Element for displaying mask sections. Used by the XamMaskedEditor.

data.name: LD_DisplayCharactersList
data.value: Element for displaying mask display characters. Used by the XamMaskedEditor.

data.name: LD_CaretElement
data.value: Element for displaying caret in the XamMaskedEditor.

data.name: LC_Appearance
data.value: Appearance

data.name: LD_CaretElement_P_BlinkVisibility
data.value: Current blinking state - whether it's visible or blinked out

data.name: LD_ValueEditor
data.value: Base class from which other value editors are derived from.

data.name: LC_Data
data.value: Data

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_Value
data.value: Gets/sets the value of the editor

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_Text
data.value: Gets/sets the value of the editor as text

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_ValueType
data.value: Gets/sets the type of values the editor manipulates

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_ValueConstraint
data.value: Gets/sets the editor input constraints

data.name: LC_Behavior
data.value: Behavior

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_InvalidValueBehavior
data.value: Determines what action to take when attempting to leave the editor with an invalid value.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_ValueToTextConverter
data.value: Specifies the converter for converting between text and value

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsValueValid
data.value: Specifies whether current value of the editor is valid

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_EditTemplate
data.value: Template used while the editor is in edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsNullable
data.value: Specifies whether null values are allowed.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_ReadOnly
data.value: Specifies whether the user is allowed to modify the value

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsAlwaysInEditMode
data.value: Gets/sets whther this editor is always in edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsEmbedded
data.value: Returns true if the editor is embedded in another control,e.g. a DataPresenter cell.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsInEditMode
data.value: Gets/sets whether this element is being edited

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_OriginalValue
data.value: Gets the original value while in edit mode (read-only)

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_Theme
data.value: Gets/sets the theme of the control

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_FormatProvider
data.value: Specifies format provider used for converting between value and text

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_Format
data.value: Specifies format used for converting between value and text

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditModeEnded
data.value: Occurs when the control has just exited edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditModeEnding
data.value: Occurs when the control is about to exit edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditModeStarted
data.value: Occurs when the control has just entered edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditModeStarting
data.value: Occurs when the control is about to enter edit mode

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditModeValidationError
data.value: Occurs when there is an input validation error

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_ValueChanged
data.value: Occurs when property 'Value' changes

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_TextChanged
data.value: Occurs when property 'Text' changes

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_E_EditTemplateChanged
data.value: Occurs when property 'EditTemplate' changes

data.name: LD_TextEditorBase_P_DisplayText
data.value: Returns the display text that's used when the editor is not in edit mode.

data.name: LD_TextEditorBase_P_NullText
data.value: The text to display when the value is null and the editor is not in edit mode.

data.name: LD_TextEditorBase_P_ValueToDisplayTextConverter
data.value: Specifies the converter for converting between display text and value

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_AllowShiftingAcrossSections
data.value: Specifies whether to shift characters across section boundaries when deleting characters. The default value is True.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SpinWrap
data.value: Specifies whether the control's spin buttons should wrap its value. The default value is False.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_TabNavigation
data.value: Specifies whether to tab between sections when Tab and Shift+Tab keys are pressed. The default value is NextControl.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_InsertMode
data.value: Specifies whether the edit mode is in 'insert' or 'overstrike'.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_Mask
data.value: Gets/sets the mask.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_DataMode
data.value: Specifies the mask mode that will be applied to data returned by the Text and Value properties.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_ClipMode
data.value: Specifies the mask mode that will be applied when copying text.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_DisplayMode
data.value: Specifies the mask mode that will be applied while not in edit mode.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_PadChar
data.value: Character used for padding the input when a placeholder character is empty. Default is space character.

data.name: LC_Display
data.value: Display

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_PromptChar
data.value: Character used for prompts. Default is '_' character.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SelectionStart
data.value: Indicates the location of the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SelectionLength
data.value: The length of the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SelectedText
data.value: The the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_TextLength
data.value: The total length of the text in the control when in edit mode.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_E_ExecutingCommand
data.value: Occurs before a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_E_ExecutedCommand
data.value: Occurs after a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor
data.value: Masked editor for editing date and/or time values.

data.name: LD_XamCurrencyEditor
data.value: Masked editor for editing currency values.

data.name: LD_XamCheckEditor
data.value: Check Editor that uses a checkbox to display and edit values.

data.name: LD_XamCheckEditor_P_IsChecked
data.value: Gets or sets the checked state of the check editor.

data.name: LD_XamCheckEditor_P_IsThreeState
data.value: Specifies whether the check editor toggles between three or two states.

data.name: LD_ValueEditorCheckBox
data.value: Check box derived class meant to be used by the XamCheckEditor.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor
data.value: Value Editor for editing values in the form of text.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_HorizontalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Determines if a horizontal scrollbar is visible.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_TextWrapping
data.value: Gets/sets whether the text will wrap if there is not enough space for it to fit on one line.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_TextAlignment
data.value: Gets/sets the text alignment.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_TextAlignmentResolved
data.value: Returns the resolved text alignment.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_VerticalScrollBarVisibility
data.value: Determines if a vertical scrollbar is visible.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_SelectionStart
data.value: Indicates the location of the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_SelectionLength
data.value: Gets/sets the length of the text selection.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_TextLength
data.value: Indicates the length of the current text in the editor.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_SelectedText
data.value: Gets or sets the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_AcceptsReturn
data.value: Gets/sets whether a return key will be accepted as part of the value.

data.name: LD_XamTextEditor_P_AcceptsTab
data.value: Gets/sets whether a tab key will be accepted as part of the value.

data.name: LD_XamNumericEditor
data.value: Masked editor for editing numeric values.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_Enumeration
data.value: A list of items which must contain the value being validated in order for it to be considered a valid value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_FixedValue
data.value: The specific value to which the value being validated must be equal.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MaxExclusive
data.value: The value which is one greater than the maximum allowed for the constrained value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MaxInclusive
data.value: The maximum value which the constrained value is allowed to be.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MaxLength
data.value: The maximum length (inclusive) allowed for the constrained value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MinExclusive
data.value: The value which is one less than the minimum allowed for the constrained value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MinInclusive
data.value: The minimum value which the constrained value is allowed to be.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_MinLength
data.value: The minimum length (inclusive) allowed for the constrained value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_Nullable
data.value: Indicates if the constrained value is allowed to be null (Nothing).

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_RegexPattern
data.value: A regular expression to which the constrained value must adhere.

data.name: LD_ValuePresenter
data.value: Abstract base class for hosting value editors in an embedded manner.

data.name: LD_ValuePresenter_P_IsInEditMode
data.value: Gets/sets whether the editor is in edit mode

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SelectAllBehavior
data.value: Specifies whether to select only the entered characters or all the characters.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_IsReadOnly
data.value: Specifies whether the user is allowed to modify the value

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor
data.value: Value Editor that displays a list of items in drop-down list from which to select one.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_ComboBoxStyle
data.value: Used for setting the Style of the underlying ComboBox

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DropDownButtonDisplayMode
data.value: Specifies when to display the drop down button

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DropDownButtonStyle
data.value: Used for setting the Style of the drop-down button

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DropDownButtonVisibility
data.value: Indicates whether the drop down button is currently visible or not.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DropDownResizeMode
data.value: Specifies whether to allow the user to resize the drop down and if so how

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_IsDropDownOpen
data.value: Specifies whether the drop-down is dropped down

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_IsEditable
data.value: Specifies whether the combo portion is editable textbox.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_ItemsProvider
data.value: Used for specifying the items to be displayed in the drop down.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_MaxDropDownHeight
data.value: Maximum drop-down list height

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_MaxDropDownWidth
data.value: Maximum drop-down list width

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_MinDropDownWidth
data.value: Minimum drop-down list width

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_SelectedIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the selected item index.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_SelectedItem
data.value: The item that's currently selected

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_SelectedText
data.value: Gets or sets the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_SelectionStart
data.value: Indicates the location of the selected text.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_SelectionLength
data.value: Gets/sets the length of the text selection.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_TextAlignmentResolved
data.value: Returns the resolved text alignment.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_TextLength
data.value: Indicates the length of the current text in the editor.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_E_ExecutingCommand
data.value: Occurs before a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_E_ExecutedCommand
data.value: Occurs after a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_E_DropDownOpened
data.value: Occurs before a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_E_DropDownClosed
data.value: Occurs when the drop-down list is closed

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_E_SelectedItemChanged
data.value: Occurs when property 'SelectedItem' changes

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_DisplayMemberPath
data.value: Path into the selected item from which to get the text

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_DisplayTextComparer
data.value: Specifies a custom comparer to use for comparing display text of each item.

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_Items
data.value: Specifies the items to display in the drop-down list of the associated XamComboEditor

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_ItemsSource
data.value: Specifies the collection from which to populate the drop down of this XamComboEditor

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_ValueComparer
data.value: Specifies a custom comparer to use for comparing values.

data.name: LD_ComboBoxItemsProvider_P_ValuePath
data.value: Path into the selected item from which to get the data value

data.name: LD_ComboBoxDataItem_P_DisplayText
data.value: Gets or sets the display text

data.name: LD_ComboBoxDataItem_P_Image
data.value: Gets or sets the source of image to display in the item

data.name: LD_ComboBoxDataItem_P_Tag
data.value: Gets or sets the tag

data.name: LD_ComboBoxDataItem_P_Value
data.value: The value associated with this item

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor
data.value: Value editor for displaying and editing data based on a mask.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_ItemsSource
data.value: Specifies the collection from which to populate the drop-down list

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DisplayMemberPath
data.value: Path into the selected item from which to get the text

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_ValuePath
data.value: Path into the selected item from which to get the data value

data.name: LC_MonthCalendar Properties
data.value: MonthCalendar Properties

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_ContainsSelectedDates
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the date contains at least one selected date.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_ContainsToday
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the item contains the current date.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_EndDate
data.value: Returns the ending date for the calendar item.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_IsActive
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the day represents the 'ActiveDay' of the containing XamMonthCalendar.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_IsLeadingOrTrailingItem
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the CalendarItem is a leading or trailing date in the containing CalendarItemGroup

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_IsSelected
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the date is selected.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_IsSelectionActive
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the containing XamMonthCalendar has keyboard focus.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_IsToday
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating whether the element is an item in the MinCalendarMode of the containing XamMonthCalendar and represents the current date.

data.name: LD_CalendarItem_P_StartDate
data.value: Returns the starting date for the calendar item.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroupPanel_P_HorizontalContentAlignment
data.value: Returns or sets the horizontal alignment of the items within the element

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroupPanel_P_GroupHeight
data.value: Returns or sets the height of the CalendarItemGroups within the panel.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroupPanel_P_GroupWidth
data.value: Returns or sets the width of the CalendarItemGroups within the panel.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroupPanel_P_MaxGroups
data.value: Returns or sets the maximum number of groups that the element may generate.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroupPanel_P_VerticalContentAlignment
data.value: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of the items within the element

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_CurrentCalendarMode
data.value: Returns the current calendar mode.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_ReferenceGroupOffset
data.value: Returns or sets an integer that is used to calculate the dates displayed within the group based on the <see ReferenceDate of the containing XamMonthCalendar.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_ShowLeadingDates
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the group should display dates from the previous range of dates.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_ScrollNextButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets the visibility of the button that scrolls its contents to display the next set of dates.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_ScrollPreviousButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets the visibility of the button that scrolls its contents to display the previous set of dates.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_ShowTrailingDates
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the group should display dates from the next range of dates.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemArea_P_DayOfWeekHeaderVisibility
data.value: Returns a value indicating the visibility of the day of week headers.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemArea_P_ItemColumns
data.value: Returns the number of columns that should be displayed in the group.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemArea_P_ItemRows
data.value: Returns the number of item rows that should be displayed in the group.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemArea_P_WeekNumbers
data.value: Returns a collection of integers that represent the week numbers of the days displayed within the month.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemArea_P_WeekNumberVisibility
data.value: Returns a value indicating whether week numbers should be displayed.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_AllowDropDown
data.value: Returns or sets a value that indicates whether the dropdown should be used to select a date.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_ComputedMaxDate
data.value: Returns the calculated maximum date value for the control

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_ComputedMinCalendarMode
data.value: Returns the preferred MinCalendarMode for the XamMonthCalendar within the dropdown of the control.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_ComputedMinDate
data.value: Returns the calculated minimum date value for the control

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_DropDownButtonDisplayMode
data.value: Specifies when to display the drop down button

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_DropDownButtonStyle
data.value: Used for setting the Style of the drop-down button

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_DropDownButtonVisibility
data.value: Indicates whether the drop down button is currently visible or not.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_E_DropDownOpened
data.value: Occurs when the dropdown has been opened.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_E_DropDownClosed
data.value: Occurs when the drop-down list is closed

data.name: LD_CalendarDay_P_IsWorkday
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether the day is considered a work day as set in the XamMonthCalendar's Workdays property.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_ActiveDate
data.value: Returns or sets the date of the active day.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_AutoAdjustCalendarDimensions
data.value: Returns or sets whether the control should automatically calculate and change the calendar dimensions based on the size used to arrange the XamMonthCalendar.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CalendarDimensions
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating the preferred rows and columns of groups to be displayed within the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CalendarDayStyle
data.value: Returns or sets the default style to use for CalendarDay instances within the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CalendarDayStyleSelector
data.value: Returns or sets an instance of a StyleSelector class that provides a style for a specific CalendarDay

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CalendarItemStyle
data.value: Returns or sets the default style to use for CalendarItem instances within the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CalendarItemStyleSelector
data.value: Returns or sets an instance of a StyleSelector class that provides a style for a specific CalendarItem

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_CurrentCalendarMode
data.value: Returns or sets which types of calendar items will be displayed to the end user.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_DayOfWeekHeaderFormat
data.value: Returns or sets the format for the header of the days of the week.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_DayOfWeekHeaderVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets a value indicating whether the day of week headers should be displayed.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_DisabledDates
data.value: Returns a modifiable collection of CalendarDateRange instances that indicates the dates that should be considered disabled.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_DisabledDaysOfWeek
data.value: Returns or sets a flagged enumeration indicating which days of the week are always disabled.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_FirstDayOfWeek
data.value: Gets or sets the DayOfWeek that represents the first day of the week or null to use the value from the current CultureInfo.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_MaxDate
data.value: Returns or sets the preferred maximum date that can be selected or activated for the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_MaxSelectedDates
data.value: Returns or sets the maximum number of days that can be selected at any time.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_MinDate
data.value: Returns or sets the preferred minimum date that can be selected or activated for the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_MinCalendarMode
data.value: Returns or sets an enumeration that indicates the minimum calendar item type that can be selected within the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_ReferenceDate
data.value: Returns or sets a date that is used to determine the dates that should be displayed within the control.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_ScrollButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets of the scroll buttons with the CalendarItemGroup instances.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_SelectedDate
data.value: Returns or sets the date of the item that should be selected or null if no item is selected.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_SelectionType
data.value: Determines how many items can be selected

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_ShowDisabledDaysOfWeek
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether days of the week disabled using the 'DisabledDaysOfWeek' should be displayed in the calendar.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_ShowLeadingAndTrailingDates
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating whether to show days from the month before/after the first/last visible month.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_TodayButtonVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets a value that indicates whether the today button should be displayed.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_WeekNumberVisibility
data.value: Returns or sets a value that indicates whether week numbers should be displayed.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_Theme
data.value: Gets/sets the general look of the XamMonthCalendar and its elements.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_WeekRule
data.value: Returns or sets the rule used to determine the first week of the year.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_Workdays
data.value: Returns or sets a flagged enumeration indicating which days of the week represent working days.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_E_ExecutingCommand
data.value: Occurs before a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_E_ExecutedCommand
data.value: Occurs after a command is performed

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_E_SelectedDatesChanged
data.value: Occurs after the SelectedDates has been changed.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar
data.value: A custom control used to display one or more months.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_AlwaysValidate
data.value: Specifies whether to validate the editor's value even if the user doesn't modify the value.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_Today
data.value: Returns a DateTime that represents today's date.

data.name: LD_ValueEditor_P_InvalidValueErrorInfo
data.value: Error information regarding why the editor's value is invalid.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DisplayValue
data.value: Value displayed in the edit portion.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_DisplayValueSource
data.value: Specifies what to display in the edit portion of the editor.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_PreDropDownAreaTemplate
data.value: Determines what, if anything, will be displayed on top of the drop down items when the drop down is open.

data.name: LD_XamComboEditor_P_PostDropDownAreaTemplate
data.value: Determines what, if anything, will be displayed below the drop down items when the drop down is open.

data.name: LD_XamDateTimeEditor_P_DateValue
data.value: The date portion of the editor's value.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_ValidateAsType
data.value: Specifies the type that the value is required to be.

data.name: LD_ValueConstraint_P_ValidationRules
data.value: ValidationRules to validate the constrained value by.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_IsTrailingGroup
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if the group is considering a leading group.

data.name: LD_CalendarItemGroup_P_IsLeadingGroup
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if the group is considering a leading group.

data.name: LD_XamMonthCalendar_P_AllowLeadingAndTrailingGroupActivation
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean that indicates if items within a CalendarItemGroup whose IsLeadingGroup or IsTrailingGroup is true can be activated.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SpinButtonDisplayMode
data.value: Specifies if and when to display spin buttons.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SpinButtonStyle
data.value: Used for setting the Style of the spin buttons

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SpinButtonVisibilityResolved
data.value: Indicates the visibility of the spin buttons.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_SpinIncrement
data.value: The amount by which to increase or decrease the value of the editor via spin buttons.

data.name: LD_XamMaskedEditor_P_AutoFillDate
data.value: Specifies whether to auto-fill empty date components when the user leaves the editor.
